## Step 1: Downloading Script 

The code for using `MultiLociBiallelicModel` can all be found within 1 R Script. This can be downloaded from their github repo from <https://github.com/Maths-against-Malaria/MultiLociBiallelicModel/blob/main/src/SNPModel.R> or can be downloaded from here [SNPModel.R](SNPModel.R). 

```{bash, eval = F}
wget https://github.com/Maths-against-Malaria/MultiLociBiallelicModel/blob/main/src/SNPModel.R
```
